pages.text: Sphenacodon is a Carboniferous-Permian synapsid. It had a lower sail on its back than the more famous Dimetrodon and it was probably the apex predator in its region. It died out shortly before the middle Permian.
$(l)Eats:$() Raw Meat$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Raw Meat$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Nested Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Find Egg in Nest
